column4: how does one change group ownership and permissions for a whole home folder?  I was trying to change username and I screwed it up
make sure you don't do it outside your $HOME since that would be *bad*
one changes group ownership for a whole home folder with chgrp -R
how did you change the name?
I see, what does:  getent passwd USERNAME_HERE   return?
and you have a /home/oldname that you are going to replace /home/family with right?
that : is part of the command by the way, so it's everyhthing in quotes here: "sudo chown family: /home/family"
oops, I mean,  sudo chown -R family: /home/family
